altername_name: 神秘迷宫风来的西林4 - 神之眼与恶魔的肚脐
name: Fushigi no Dungeon Fuurai no Shiren 4: Kami no Hitomi to Akuma no Heso
overview: Shiren and Koppa shipwreck to anisland, and the natives condemn them as demons. After a girl named Kamina rescued them -- just to become their prisoner instead -- the priest has given them one chance to redeeem themselves, which is to find the Jaguar's Eye.
